Saturday 09 June — 7:45PM

Reginald D Hunter

Seann Walsh

Jen Brister

Mark Olver

Spellbinding & brilliantly unpredictable multi-award winning US star Reginald D Hunter headlines Saturday night in the Big Top. Star of Qi, Have I Got News For You & his own hit BBC2 series ‘Reginald D Hunter’s Songs Of The South’, Reg’s searingly honest and hilarious material has garnered him a popular fanbase that spans the generations.

Simply exhilarating…This is comedy of a rare scope

The Times
Joining Milton is an all-star supporting line-up with Bristol’s very own multi-award winning comedy superhero Mark Watson, acclaimed Radio 4 favourite Shappi Khorsandi and globe-trotting laughter-master Stephen K Amos as host.
Festival Opens

6:00PM

Show Starts

7:45PM

Tickets

£20 - £25
